data.title: Tournament Central 2024
data.meta_description: 2024 WFTDA postseason Regional and Global Championship tournament information can be found below. More detailed information for participants and attendees will be provided by the tournament hosts. Learn more about the 2024 WFTDA competitive system and tournament selection process at wftda.com/wftda-announces-new-regional-competitive-system-and-championships/. North America-Northeast Europe Oceania North America-West North America-South Championships Global Championships November 1-3, 2024…READ MORE »
data.text:
2024 WFTDA postseason Regional and Global Championship tournament information can be found below. More detailed information for participants and attendees will be provided by the tournament hosts. Learn more about the 2024 WFTDA competitive system and tournament selection process at wftda.com/wftda-announces-new-regional-competitive-system-and-championships/.

North America-Northeast Europe Oceania North America-West North America-South Championships

Global Championships

November 1-3, 2024

Portland, OR, USA

Hosted by Rose City Rollers

Tickets, sponsor information, and more available on the 2024 WFTDA Global Championships website.

Regional Championships

North America-Northeast

May 17-19, 2024

State College, PA, USA

Hosted by State College Area Roller Derby

Number of Bids to Global Championships: 3

Website

Participating Teams

Arch Rival All Stars 1st Place

Montréal New Skids on the Block 2nd Place

Gotham All Stars 3rd Place

Windy City All-Stars

Boston A Team

Gotham Wall Street Traitors

Oceania

June 8-10 2024

Wayville, South Australia

Hosted at The Great Southern Slam by Adelaide Roller Derby

Number of Bids to Global Championships: 2

Website

Participating Teams

VRDL All Stars (VRDL A) 1st Place

Adelaide Ads (ADRD) 2nd Place

Brisbane Punk Blockers (BRC) 3rd Place

Perth West Coast Evils (PRD)

Sun State Swarm (SUN)

Pirate City Pirate Union (PCR)

Sydney Velociraptors ‘A’ (SRDL)

Richter City Roller Derby (RCRD)

South Sea Sirens (SSRD)

VRDL Thunder (VRDL B)

Canberra Vice City Rollers (CRDL)

Convict City Orange Thunder (CCRDL)

Bracket

Note: TGSS and WFTDA Rankings Committee collaborated on the seeding of this event, and adjusted the seeding of the bracket to account for a team’s inflated initial seeding and based on regional game results. WFTDA Rankings approved the adjustment, and for TGSS seeding to be different from WFTDA’s published rankings.
